about_the_game:
The VEGAS Pro 22 - Steam Edition has everything you need to edit your gaming videos, be it for your streaming highlights or exciting gameplays. Stay in the flow by editing video and audio on the unique all-in-one timeline and get a complete post-production kit for the finishing touches.

Whether you want to show off your own tactics, uncover Easter eggs or share valuable tips, the VEGAS Pro Steam Edition gives you the creative freedom to do so. For example, automatically mask individual elements, such as characters, and apply targeted effects to them. Set the highlights in scene with zooms, slow motion and fast motion. Or create your own transitions, effects and color looks to give your videos your own personal visual style.

Highlights

  • Seamless editing of video and audio as well as post-production on the timeline
  • AI-supported tools and workflows for time-consuming edits
  • Wide range of effects, filters, transitions and titles
  • Create the perfect look with color corrections and LUTs
  • Create 2D and 3D composites using layers and masks
  • Professional tool set for audio editing for high-quality scores & soundtracks
  • OFX and VST-3 interface for access to countless other video and audio plug-ins

    What’s new? 

    • NEW AI Auto Reframe - adapt gameplay videos faster for 1:1 or 9:16
    • NEW Beat & Tempo Detection for perfect cuts on beat & tempo
    • NEW Audio Sync to sync your recordings over the sound
    • NEW Optimized file explorer for efficient media management
    • NEW AI-based tools to improve image quality
detailed_description:
The VEGAS Pro 22 - Steam Edition has everything you need to edit your gaming videos, be it for your streaming highlights or exciting gameplays. Stay in the flow by editing video and audio on the unique all-in-one timeline and get a complete post-production kit for the finishing touches.

Whether you want to show off your own tactics, uncover Easter eggs or share valuable tips, the VEGAS Pro Steam Edition gives you the creative freedom to do so. For example, automatically mask individual elements, such as characters, and apply targeted effects to them. Set the highlights in scene with zooms, slow motion and fast motion. Or create your own transitions, effects and color looks to give your videos your own personal visual style.

Highlights

  • Seamless editing of video and audio as well as post-production on the timeline
  • AI-supported tools and workflows for time-consuming edits
  • Wide range of effects, filters, transitions and titles
  • Create the perfect look with color corrections and LUTs
  • Create 2D and 3D composites using layers and masks
  • Professional tool set for audio editing for high-quality scores & soundtracks
  • OFX and VST-3 interface for access to countless other video and audio plug-ins

    What’s new? 

    • NEW AI Auto Reframe - adapt gameplay videos faster for 1:1 or 9:16
    • NEW Beat & Tempo Detection for perfect cuts on beat & tempo
    • NEW Audio Sync to sync your recordings over the sound
    • NEW Optimized file explorer for efficient media management
    • NEW AI-based tools to improve image quality

movies.name: VEGAS Pro 22 Steam Edition - What's New

name: VEGAS Pro 22 Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10 | 11
  • Processor: 6th Generation Intel Core i5 (or AMD equivalent) or better with 2.5 Ghz and 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX or GTX 9XX series or higher with 4GB; AMD/ATI® Radeon with 4GB and VCE 3.0 or higher (Radeon Pro series with 8GB for HDR and 32 bit projects); Intel® GPU HD Graphics 630 series or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Import Video: BlackMagic RAW, HEVC/H.265, AVC/H.264, MP4, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, AVI, WMV, M4V, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / XDCAM EX / HD 422 / MXF / ProDisc / HDCAM SR, MPEG IMX, DV, HDV, AVCHD, Panasonic P2, RED RAW Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP2, MP3, M4A, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, GIF, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR, WDP, DNG, HEIC/HEIF Other: Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/ DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), Broadcast Wave Format, Closed Captioning (SRT) Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K Export Video: HEVC/H.265, AVC/H.264, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, MP4, AVI, WMV, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / MXF / HDCAM SR, XDCAM EX Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP3, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR Other: VEGAS Project Archive (*.veg, *.vf), Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), XDCAM Disc Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10 | 11
  • Processor: 7th Generation Intel Core i7 (or AMD equivalent) or better with 3.0 Ghz and 8 Cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX or GTX 9XX series or higher with 4GB (8GB RTX series recommended for 8K); AMD/ATI® Radeon with 4GB and VCE 3.0 or higher (Radeon Pro series with 8GB for HDR and 32 bit projects); Intel® GPU HD Graphics 630 series or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Import Video: BlackMagic RAW, HEVC/H.265, AVC/H.264, MP4, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, AVI, WMV, M4V, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / XDCAM EX / HD 422 / MXF / ProDisc / HDCAM SR, MPEG IMX, DV, HDV, AVCHD, Panasonic P2, RED RAW Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP2, MP3, M4A, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, GIF, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR, WDP, DNG, HEIC/HEIF Other: Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/ DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), Broadcast Wave Format, Closed Captioning (SRT) Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K Export Video: HEVC/H.265, AVC/H.264, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, MP4, AVI, WMV, Sony XAVC / XAVC-S / MXF / HDCAM SR, XDCAM EX Audio: AIFF, AAC, MP3, OGG Vorbis, WAV, WMA, FLAC Image: BMP, PNG, JPG, TIFF, DPX, OpenEXR Other: VEGAS Project Archive (*.veg, *.vf), Premiere/After Effects (*.prproj), Final Cut Pro 7/DaVinci Resolve (*.xml), Final Cut Pro X (*.fcpxml), EDL Text File (*.txt), XDCAM Disc Resolutions: SD, HD, 4K, 8K

short_description: VEGAS Pro 22 – Steam Edition. The video software that takes your streaming highlights and gameplays to the next level.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
